snippet: Mohonk Mountain House, a historic hotel in the Hudson Valley, shut down for a week on Friday after a norovirus outbreak sickened a few hundred people this month.
abstract: Mohonk Mountain House, historic hotel in New York's Hudson Valley, shuts down for a week after a virus outbreak sickens several hundred people over course of month; experts say that virus is consistent with gastrointestinal bug norovirus.
lead_paragraph: Mohonk Mountain House, a historic hotel in the Hudson Valley, shut down for a week on Friday after a norovirus outbreak sickened a few hundred people this month.

headline.main: Virus Outbreak Shuts Down Hudson Valley Hotel for Week
headline.print_headline: Virus Outbreak Shuts Down Hudson Valley Hotel for Week
